channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Race for the Next Ozempic
item.description: The next wave of obesity drugs could help people lose even more weight—and make some pharma companies a fortune.

item.title: Pearl raises $58M to help dentists make better diagnoses using AI
item.description: Dental care is a necessity, yet many patients lack confidence in their dentists’ ability to provide accurate diagnoses and appropriate treatments. Som...

item.title: The Time Is Right for a Folding iPhone
item.description: If Apple really does come out with a foldable smartphone, it’ll be late to the party—but will somehow arrive just as the real fun is starting.

item.title: Spanish startup Exoticca raises a €60M Series D for its tour packages platform
item.description: Exoticca’s platform connects flights, hotels, meals, transfers, transportation and more, plus the local companies at the destinations. © 2024 TechCrun...

item.title: Why Paris 2024 Olympic Athletes Are Sleeping on Cardboard Beds
item.description: The competitors’ bedroom furniture is simply stiff paper, along with coffee tables made from badminton shuttlecocks and ottomans made from parachute f...

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg imagines content creators making AI clones of themselves
item.description: Content creators are busy people. Most spend more than 20 hours a week creating new content for their respective corners of the web. That doesn’t leav...

item.title: The 29 Best Shows on Apple TV+ Right Now (August 2024)
item.description: Sunny, Constellation, and Presumed Innocent are among the best shows on Apple TV+ this month.

item.title: Elon Musk sets new date for Tesla robotaxi reveal, calls everything beyond autonomy ‘noise’
item.description: Elon Musk says he will show off Tesla’s purpose-built “robotaxi” prototype during an event October 10, after scrapping a previous plan to reveal it Au...

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Coconuts for Kamala Harris
item.description: Prominent names in Big Tech are rallying behind Kamala Harris following Joe Biden’s exit from the presidential race.

item.title: Alphabet to invest another $5B into Waymo
item.description: Alphabet will spend an additional $5 billion on its self-driving subsidiary, Waymo, over the next few years, according to Ruth Porat, the company’s ch...
